mapper.select: SELECT ca.change_id, ca.student_id, ca.dormitory_id, ca.bed_id, ca.in_dormitory_id, ca.in_bed_id, ca.apply_time, ca.apply_reason, ca.apply_status, ca.apply_result, ss.student_name, ss.student_num, ss.student_phone, bed.bed_name, bed_in.bed_name AS in_bed_name, di.dormitory_name, di.building_floor, di_in.dormitory_name AS in_dormitory_name, di_in.building_floor AS in_building_floor, bi.building_id, bi.building_name, bi.short_name, bi_in.building_id AS in_building_id, bi_in.building_name AS in_building_name, bi_in.short_name AS in_short_name FROM change_apply ca INNER JOIN sys_student ss ON ca.student_id = ss.student_id LEFT JOIN bed_info bed ON ca.bed_id = bed.bed_id LEFT JOIN bed_info bed_in ON ca.in_bed_id = bed_in.bed_id LEFT JOIN dormitory_info di ON ca.dormitory_id = di.dormitory_id LEFT JOIN dormitory_info di_in ON ca.in_dormitory_id = di_in.dormitory_id LEFT JOIN building_info bi ON di.building_id = bi.building_id LEFT JOIN building_info bi_in ON di_in.building_id = bi_in.building_id WHERE ca.delete_flag = 0 AND ca.change_id = #{changeId}
